---

import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";
import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Assign or unassign asset owner"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/assets/{assetId}/owner"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Assigns or removes an owner for a specific asset. Updates the asset's ownership relationship which may trigger checkout workflows and update location based on the new owner.

**Prerequisites**
1. **AssetId** - Use [POST /api/v1.0/assets](/docs/api/assets/search-assets) to identify the asset and extract `Items[].AssetId`.
2. **OwnerId** - Use [POST /api/v1.0/search](/docs/api/users/search-users) to find the user and extract `Item.Users[].UserId`.

**Workflow Example**
1. Search for asset: [POST /api/v1.0/assets](/docs/api/assets/search-assets) with tag or serial filter.
2. Search for user: [POST /api/v1.0/search](/docs/api/users/search-users) with name or email.
3. Submit [POST /api/v1.0/assets/\{assetId\}/owner](/docs/api/assets/set-asset-owner) with OwnerId to assign ownership.

**Minimal Required Fields**: OwnerId (set to null to unassign)

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"assetId","in":"path","required":true,"description":"UUID of the asset to assign owner to. Obtain via [POST /api/v1.0/assets](/docs/api/assets/search-assets), extract `Items[].AssetId` from response.","schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"},"x-obtained-from":{"operationId":"searchAssets","endpoint":"POST /api/v1.0/assets","responseField":"Items[].AssetId"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"Request to set or transfer ownership of an asset. Supports transferring ownership from one asset to another, or assigning a new owner directly.","properties":{"OwnerId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","nullable":true,"description":"UUID of the new owner (user). Obtain from POST /api/v1.0/users search.","x-obtained-from":{"operationId":"searchUsers","endpoint":"POST /api/v1.0/users","responseField":"Items[].UserId"}},"FromAssetId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","nullable":true,"description":"UUID of the asset to transfer ownership from"},"FromAssetStatusId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","nullable":true,"description":"Status to set on the 'from' asset after transfer"},"FromAssetReason":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"Reason for removing ownership from the 'from' asset"},"ToAssetId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","nullable":true,"description":"UUID of the asset to transfer ownership to"},"TicketId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","nullable":true,"description":"UUID of the ticket. Obtain via [POST /api/v1.0/tickets](/docs/api/tickets/search-tickets), extract `Items[].TicketId`.","x-obtained-from":{"operationId":"searchTickets","endpoint":"POST even if validations would normally prevent it","default":false},"Source":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"Source system or integration initiating the change"},"UpdateAssetWithUserLocation":{"type":"boolean","nullable":true,"description":"When true, update the asset's location to match the new owner's location"}},"title":"AssetInventoryOptions"}],"type":"object"}},"title":"SetAssetOwnerRequest"},"example":{"OwnerId":"51c89694-ae9f-f011-8e61-6045bd7991ab","UpdateAssetWithUserLocation":true,"UpdateAssetWithUserRoom":false,"Force":false,"SkipRulesProcessing":false}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
